caption.p: The sum of monounsaturated (∑MUFA) and polyunsaturated (∑PUFA) fatty acids, the sum of eicosapentaenoic and docosahexaenoic fatty acids (EPA + DHA), the sum of n-3 and n-6 content plus ratios between n-6/n-3 and polyunsaturated fatty acids/saturated fatty acids (PUFA/SFA) in crude and refined oils from: ( A) tuna by-products, ( B) tuna liver, ( C) seabass and gilthead seabream by-products and ( D) cod liver oil (control).
